body:
Just for some clarification and to avoid miss-information, saying EIPs
copied BIPs is incomplete. BIPs copied Python Improvement Proposals
directly and Ethereum copied BIPs with almost no changes (ERC is the
exception)

The Python system was designed for a very different ecosystem with very
different constraints. One notable example is the complete lack of
decentralization.

For what it is worth, the system hasn’t been reexamined from a principals
and design perspective since the change of scenery.

Cheers,
James


On Fri, Nov 8, 2019 at 11:58 AM Bob Summerwill <notifications@github.com>
